name: Dr. Sarah Ahmed
bio: Dr. Sarah Ahmed specializes in machine learning and AI with over 10 years of teaching experience. She is passionate about helping students excel in the field of data science.

name: Mr. John Miller
bio: John Miller is a senior full-stack web developer with expertise in React, Node.js, and Tailwind CSS. He loves mentoring students and building innovative projects.

name: Dr. Davis Carter
bio: Dr. Davis Carter is a PhD in Artificial Intelligence and a renowned researcher in natural language processing. Her classes are highly interactive and insightful.

name: Mr. Abdul Rahman
bio: Abdul Rahman has developed over 50 apps for Android and iOS. He is a skilled instructor with a knack for simplifying complex concepts for his students.

name: Mr. David Zhang
bio: David Zhang is a game development expert with extensive experience in Unity and Unreal Engine. He loves sharing his passion for creating immersive games.
